pull.title: BIP 83: Dynamic Hierarchical Deterministic Key Trees
pull.body: Proposed deterministic key tree structures suffer from the limitation that once a hierarchical level is used to derive signing keys, we can no longer nest deeper levels. This BIP proposes a solution to this problem.

rename.from: Added BIP for dynamic hierarchical deterministic key trees.
rename.to: BIP 114: Dynamic Hierarchical Deterministic Key Trees
